scenes.description: Intro cinematic for the 'Grimoire' concert, featuring crowd shots and a stylized animation of a skeletal gate opening.
Mori Calliope performs the song 'MERA MERA' on stage with high-energy choreography and pyrotechnics.

subtitles.original: WHAT IS AN EXISTENCE?
subtitles.english: WHAT IS AN EXISTENCE?

subtitles.original: WAKE UP.
subtitles.english: WAKE UP.

subtitles.original: She who never imagined rising above it all.
subtitles.english: She who never imagined rising above it all.

subtitles.original: Found the Abyss more beautiful than the Heavens.
subtitles.english: Found the Abyss more beautiful than the Heavens.

subtitles.original: Step by step, she journeyed deeper.
subtitles.english: Step by step, she journeyed deeper.

subtitles.original: Her story woven like a dark spell.
subtitles.english: Her story woven like a dark spell.

subtitles.original: As the Grim Reaper writes her Memoir.
subtitles.english: As the Grim Reaper writes her Memoir.

subtitles.original: Chika-chika, chika-chika...
subtitles.english: Chika-chika, chika-chika...

subtitles.original: せればかせれば せりゃあ即効で Shake it up
subtitles.english: If it comes to that, then do it immediately and shake it up

subtitles.original: Do what I want したり顔で Knock you out
subtitles.english: Do what I want and knock you out with a smug face

subtitles.original: 渇いては湧き 沸いてはボケちまうちはさ
subtitles.english: As it dries, it springs up, as it boils, you start acting like an idiot

subtitles.original: せればかせれば せりゃあ即効で Shake it up
subtitles.english: If it comes to that, then do it immediately and shake it up

subtitles.original: Wanna be 狂い咲く サボれば即ストップ
subtitles.english: Wanna be blooming madly, if you slack off, you'll stop immediately

subtitles.original: Get your head out your ass and what you got?
subtitles.english: Get your head out your ass and what you got?

subtitles.original: 会津の会津の 神が舞い降りる
subtitles.english: The god of Aizu, the god of Aizu, descends upon us

subtitles.original: 万歳三唱 すんでの夜通し
subtitles.english: Three cheers of banzai, just before the night ends

subtitles.original: 阿呆 情緒酌量も余地なし
subtitles.english: Idiot, there's no room for extenuating circumstances

subtitles.original: 即死系ハイ 地獄までお行きなさい
subtitles.english: Instant-death-type high, go straight to hell

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 今すぐにお行きなさい
subtitles.english: Go away right now

subtitles.original: Mera mera burn it out day
subtitles.english: Mera mera burn it out day

subtitles.original: 摩訶不思議な運命
subtitles.english: A mysterious fate

subtitles.original: Mera mera 厄介だ
subtitles.english: Mera mera, it's troublesome

subtitles.original: 灰になるまで Mera mera
subtitles.english: Until it turns to ash, mera mera

subtitles.original: にさせた さあ 踊り狂っちゃえ
subtitles.english: You made it happen, now dance like crazy

subtitles.original: You’re very Paradise
subtitles.english: You’re very Paradise

subtitles.original: Go up and down
subtitles.english: Go up and down

subtitles.original: せればかせれば せりゃあ即効で Shake it up
subtitles.english: If it comes to that, then do it immediately and shake it up

subtitles.original: Do what I want したり顔で Knock you out
subtitles.english: Do what I want and knock you out with a smug face

subtitles.original: My better pinnacle is pinnacle but first give me the mic god!
subtitles.english: My better pinnacle is pinnacle but first give me the mic god!

subtitles.original: And may I just remind you I can pull this curtain
subtitles.english: And may I just remind you I can pull this curtain

subtitles.original: Fine down Jordan dungeon de die on day
subtitles.english: Fine down Jordan dungeon de die on day

subtitles.original: Come on C-A-L-L you already know
subtitles.english: Come on C-A-L-L you already know

subtitles.original: Scythe at the ready slow and steady give 'em a show
subtitles.english: Scythe at the ready slow and steady give 'em a show

subtitles.original: They wanna get real close, can't learn to let go
subtitles.english: They wanna get real close, can't learn to let go

subtitles.original: Try and dance for the Reaper, better look up or below
subtitles.english: Try and dance for the Reaper, better look up or below

subtitles.original: Slay to the beat, breathe it free, redder than the rose
subtitles.english: Slay to the beat, breathe it free, redder than the rose

subtitles.original: Sink 'em back 'til the sun rise, heaven is closed
subtitles.english: Sink 'em back 'til the sun rise, heaven is closed

subtitles.original: Sleep until the next night, you know where we go
subtitles.english: Sleep until the next night, you know where we go

subtitles.original: Believe I self keep it tight SHINIGAMI FLOW, alright?
subtitles.english: Believe I self keep it tight SHINIGAMI FLOW, alright?

subtitles.original: Mera mera burn it out day
subtitles.english: Mera mera burn it out day

subtitles.original: 摩訶不思議な運命
subtitles.english: A mysterious fate

subtitles.original: Mera mera 厄介だ
subtitles.english: Mera mera, it's troublesome

subtitles.original: 灰になるまで Mera mera
subtitles.english: Until it turns to ash, mera mera

subtitles.original: にさせた ああ 目覚めな見上げな
subtitles.english: You made it happen, ah, wake up and look up

subtitles.original: Better start looking about, ほらまだまだ足りない
subtitles.english: Better start looking about, look, it's still not enough

subtitles.original: Spell tied the sun, sun, sun, sun
subtitles.english: Spell tied the sun, sun, sun, sun

subtitles.original: Service plus now down, down, down, da-da-down
subtitles.english: Service plus now down, down, down, da-da-down

subtitles.original: I don't care sing along, la la la la
subtitles.english: I don't care sing along, la la la la

subtitles.original: But not this time, you don't gotta run
subtitles.english: But not this time, you don't gotta run

subtitles.original: 会いたい悶着 狂う執着
subtitles.english: I want to see the trouble, the obsession that goes mad

subtitles.original: 灼熱に飛び込んで give it to ya, give it to ya!
subtitles.english: Dive into the scorching heat, give it to ya, give it to ya!

subtitles.original: 皆さん！ You get the rest, Mori's in the building...
subtitles.english: Everyone! You get the rest, Mori's in the building...

subtitles.original: So you know you're already dead!
subtitles.english: So you know you're already dead!

subtitles.original: Everybody come on now!
subtitles.english: Everybody come on now!

subtitles.original: Chika-chika, chika-chika...
subtitles.english: Chika-chika, chika-chika...

subtitles.original: Yeah! Jump! Jump! Jump! 地獄までお行きなさい！
subtitles.english: Yeah! Jump! Jump! Jump! Go straight to hell!

subtitles.english: Mera mera burn it out day

subtitles.english: A mysterious fate

subtitles.english: Until it turns to ash, mera mera

subtitles.english: You made it happen, now dance like crazy

subtitles.original: You’re very Paradise
